```{python}
import ssb_pubmd as ssb
```
{% for block in article.blocks -%}

{% if block.type == "highchart" -%}
```{python}
{{block.dataframe_code}}

highchart = ssb.Highchart(
    title="{{ block.data.title }}",
    graph_type="{{ block.data.graph_type }}",
    dataframe=df,
    xlabel="{{ block.data.xlabel }}",
    ylabel="{{ block.data.ylabel }}",
)
ssb.create("{{ block.key }}", highchart)
```

{% elif block.type == "factbox" -%}
```{python}
factbox = ssb.Factbox(
    title="{{ block.data.title }}",
    display_type="{{ block.data.display_type }}",
)
ssb.create("{{ block.key }}", factbox)
```
{% endif -%}

{% endfor -%}
